title: Self-Isolate
alt: Turns out I've been "practicing social distancing" for years without even realizing it was a thing!
transcript:
[Cueball sits in an armchair watching television. A zigzag line from the TV indicates that the text is a voice from the TV.]
Voice from television: Experts are saying people may need to "self-isolate" to combat the virus.[A slim beat panel with Cueball sitting silent in the armchair.][Zoomed in on Cueball in the armchair. A starburst on the right border indicates the voice from an off-panel person.]
Cueball: ... I've been practicing for this moment my whole life.
Off-panel voice: I don't think that'sâ€”
Cueball: Quick, make plans and watch how fast I cancel!
